meanings.sent1: The school decided to recharter the bus for the upcoming field trip.
meanings.sent2: The company had to recharter their boat after it expired.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to recharter my library card, so I couldn't borrow any new books.
meanings.sent4: The captain had to recharter his crew for the next voyage across the sea.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to recharter your passport before your trip!

meanings.sent1: The city council voted to recharter the local community center for another year.
meanings.sent2: We need to recharter our lease agreement before it expires next month.
meanings.sent3: I had to recharter my gym membership because I've been going every day.
meanings.sent4: The homeowner decided to recharter the property rental for another term.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to recharter your subscription before it runs out.
